title: #SMKICKS
description:
We're so excited to debut the launch of #SMKICKS and to reintroduce the Steve Madden Sneaker collection. This campaign and its stars are all about music and movement, both very important to the Steve Madden culture. 

So, what makes you move?

#SMKICKS

asset.title: #SMKICKS
asset.description:
We're so excited to debut the launch of #SMKICKS and to reintroduce the Steve Madden Sneaker collection. This campaign and its stars are all about music and movement, both very important to the Steve Madden culture. 

So, what makes you move?

Shop Steve Madden sneakers: http://bit.ly/SMKICKS


#SMKICKS
asset.author: STEVE MADDEN

transcripts: You don’t have to try to hard with sneakers, you just put them on and they talk. With sneakers you can own it. Rock and roll with sneakers baby.
